DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : NESTLE PLANS NEW DAIRY PRODUCTION IN CHINA
DOC.TEXT: The Swiss company said it plans to invest $ 45 million in two dairy_product ventures in Qingdao in the province of Shandong in eastern China.The joint_ventures -- Nestle will hold a 75 % stake in each -- are with Qingdao Milk Course Co . One operation will produce products such_as sweetened condensed milk and milk_powder . The other will be used for ice_cream and yogurt production . Nestle has three factories operating in China , and " business is growing at a very satisfactory rate , " the company said .
